title: Deluxe King Room
service: Free WiFi, Breakfast Included, Ocean View
description: Experience ultimate comfort in our Deluxe King Room, featuring a spacious layout, modern decor, and a luxurious king-sized bed. Enjoy stunning ocean views and unwind with complimentary WiFi and breakfast.

title: Double Queen Room
service: Free WiFi, City View, Complimentary Drinks
description: Perfect for families or groups, our Double Queen Room offers two plush queen-sized beds and a cozy atmosphere. Enjoy city views, free WiFi, and complimentary drinks during your stay.

title: Suite with Balcony
service: Free WiFi, Breakfast Included, Private Balcony
description: Indulge in luxury in our Suite with Balcony, offering expansive space, elegant furnishings, and a private balcony with breathtaking views. This suite includes a king bed, free WiFi, and a delicious breakfast.

title: Standard Single Room
service: Free WiFi, Mountain View, Room Service
description: Ideal for solo travelers, our Standard Single Room offers a comfortable single bed and a peaceful environment. Relax with mountain views, free WiFi, and convenient room service.
